name: Breakfast with Travel Expert to ask everything for Vietnam Travel
description: I'm travel blogger live in Ho Chi Minh city at Bill Balo, I have traveled 2 months around Vietnam by motobike in 2013 and spend a lot of my time for sharing about travel experience for Vietnamese people for 4 years. So, my information will help you to plan your trip in Ho Chi Minh city by yourself. Why don't we have a breakfast together and you can ask me whatever you want.
